snippet.title: Quantum Break coming to Steam & PC retail September 29th 2016
snippet.description:
Quantum Break on Steam http://store.steampowered.com/app/474960

Quantum Break: Timeless Collector's Edition https://www.amazon.com/Quantum-Break-Timeless-Collectors-PC/dp/B01K7SG0EY/

Download the trailer song "Bridges of Hope" by Petri Alanko http://www.remedygames.com/new-quantum-break-soundtrack-piece-and-ringtones-for-free/

From Remedy Entertainment, the masters of cinematic action games, comes Quantum Break, a time-amplified suspenseful blockbuster. The Quantum Break experience is part game, part live action show—where decisions in one dramatically affect the other.
